me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api

Interface LightSensitive

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSolarCell, DenseSolar

    public interface LightSensitive
    Represents an STB block which cares about the light level.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte getLightLevel()
      Get the current ambient light level.
      int getLightMeterSlot()
      Get the slot in the block's GUI where a light meter can be displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • getLightLevel

        Get the current ambient light level.
        Returns:
        the light level

      • getLightMeterSlot

        int getLightMeterSlot()
        Get the slot in the block's GUI where a light meter can be displayed.
        Returns:
        a slot number
